description: Chester Wisniewski, senior security advisor at Sophos, joins us to talk about how PRISM will continue to affect the US tech industry abroad. Plus, what it's like for mid-career switchers who are learning to code, and the advantages and disadvantages of being the oldest student in a class of coding “wizards."
teaser: Chester Wisniewski, senior security advisor at Sophos, joins us to talk about how PRISM will continue to affect the US tech industry abroad. Plus, what it's like for mid-career switchers who are learning to code, and the advantages and disadvantages of being the oldest student in a class of coding “wizards."
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, March 24, 2014
